snippet.title: [PS2] L2 Love x Loop [エルノジジョウ ラブ アンド ループ]
snippet.description:
Humans are at war with robots and the machines are at the upper hand. Everything is 
destroyed and the defenseless humans are living in the rubbles, out of the robots' 
sights. A normal human girl Nanami has been living a poor but content life with her 
sister and her childhood friends.

However, everything changes on her birthday. The robots discovers the humans and Nanami 
only escapes a certain death because she is away from the shelter on that day. Upon 
hearing her sister's death, Nanami is inconsolable with grief. The only thought on her 
mind is "What if I have not wondered away from the shelter?"

The "what if" part happened, for she meets the friendly robot Kagome who grants her the 
power to travel back time and change history. With this power, will she be able to save 
her sister, fall in love with the man of her dreams and become the light of the world?

Visit my blog get more game download for free : http://www.weshare2u.com
